code: @Test public void testTransformer() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedBodiesReceived("test").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").bean(TransformerImpl.class, "transform").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
